track.name: Love for Sale
comments: As far as I know this a track originally off an album by Cannonball (Somethin' Else). I get the feeling that maybe Miles had a tendency to take over any session he was involved in, but credit where credit's due. It is very good, though...
One of my favorite Adderly solos!
It's a shame"Jazz Track" only had 4 songs. The Plaza & Newport concerts are very good, and yeah, Kind of Blue (of course), but I want more studio tracks from the 58-59 sextet.
I love the note davis plays around 32/33 seconds in...
That rim shot at the start of Trane's solo makes the hairs stand up on the back of my neck everytime - sublime
Dude, at the end of Miles' solo it's not Coltrane that plays next but Cannonball.
